attributes.action: Uregently Review Carers' Income during retirement
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background:
The paltry £44 per week (or so) for looking after a disabled relative works out at about 25p per hour for a full week.

Even this is taken away on attaining state pension age; at a time when the health of both the carer and cared-for
deteriorates with advancing age.

reasons: Duplicate - this is similar to and/or overlaps with an existing petition or petitions
